code: /* eslint-disable prettier/prettier */ /* eslint-disable no-restricted-globals */export var required=function required(value){return value?undefined:'required';};export var mustBeEmail=function mustBeEmail(value){return value&&!/^[A-Z0-9._%+-]+@[A-Z0-9.-]+\.[A-Z]{2,4}$/i.test(value)?'invalid':undefined;};export var mustBeNumber=function mustBeNumber(value){return isNaN(value)?'Must be a number':undefined;};export var minValue=function minValue(min){return function(value){return isNaN(value)||value>=min?undefined:"Should be greater than ".concat(min);};};export var composeValidators=function composeValidators(){for(var _len=arguments.length,validators=new Array(_len),_key=0;_key<_len;_key++){validators[_key]=arguments[_key];}return function(value){return validators.reduce(function(error,validator){return error||validator(value);},undefined);};};
